resources.string: Fingerprint under the Super AMOLED screen

Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra is the biggest smartphone in size compared to the Galaxy S20 series smartphones released in 2020.
 	The smartphone is powered by the Exynos 990 – Global Octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 – USA processor.
 	The device comes with a big display screen of 6.9 inches that consists of a Dynamic AMOLED 2X capacitive touchscreen that provides a resolution of 1440 x 3200 pixels.
 	The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass 6 and comes with features such as HDR10+, Always-on display, and 120Hz@FHD, 60Hz@QHD.
